loginDescription: Injiza amakuru yawe kugira ngo ubone urubuga rw'ubuyobozi.
registerDescription: Fungura konti nshya y'umuyobozi ukoresheje kode y'ibanga.
homePagePurpose: Gucunga neza amanota y'abanyeshuri, gukora raporo no koroshya imiyoborere y'ishuri.
homePageFeature1Desc: Imbonerahamwe zihariye ku Bayobozi, Abarimu n'Abanyamabanga.
homePageFeature2Desc: Kwinjiza amanota byoroshye, kubara mu buryo bwikora n'indangamanota zirambuye.
homePageFeature3Desc: Kora raporo z'umusaruro w'umunyeshuri, ishuri n'isomo.
languageSettingsDescription: Hitamo ururimi ukunda rwo kugaragaza porogaramu.
systemDefaultsDescription: Shyiraho agaciro fatizo n'amakuru y'ishuri kuri sisitemu yose.
passMarkDescription: Iri nota (50) rikoreshwa muri sisitemu yose mu kumenya niba umunyeshuri yatsinze cyangwa yatsinzwe mu manota na raporo.
themeDescription: Uburyo bw'umwijima bushobora guhindurwa hakoreshejwe akabuto k'izuba/ukwezi mu mutwe wa porogaramu.
notificationsDescription: Imenyesha rya email ku bikorwa bya sisitemu riteganyijwe mu gihe kizaza kandi ntiriraboneka ubu.
advancedFeaturesDescription: Ibyiciro byisumbuyeho nko kohereza amakuru muri PDF/Excel kuri raporo zose, igenamigambi rirambuye rya raporo, n'igenamiterere ry'itumanaho (urugero: SMS/email) biteganyijwe mu gihe kizaza cya Report-Manager Lite. Amahitamo ahari yo "Kohereza muri CSV" atanga uburyo bw'ibanze bwo gukuramo amakuru.
noPermissionSystemSettings: Ntabwo wemerewe guhindura igenamiterere rya sisitemu.
